channel.title: Need help fixing tabs
channel.description:
ok heres the problem.
first wenever someone teled to home they got tbed.
i fixed that..
now wenever i say any commands ::yell ::mod ::admin ect..
i get teled to "home" but its not home its the shops.
and wen i click the home tab it teles me to shops.

item.description:
@kiamyhelp wrote:

sendMessage("You teleport to the pure pk area!"); } } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("shops")) { teleportToX = 3360; teleportToY = 2971; sendMessage("You are teleported to the shop area. } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("clanwars"))

item.title: Need help fixing tabs
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

[quote=“cwg452003, post:8, topic:217900”]Well the problem is with the teleblock off so just take it off.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("shops")) { sendMessage("the shops."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { sendMessage("buy st00f"); teleportToX = 3360; teleportToY = 2971; }

See if that works[/quote]

Thats not right…

Try this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("shops")) {
   teleportToX = 3360;
   teleportToY = 2971;
sendMessage("You are teleported to the shop area.
}

That should work if thats what your trying to do.

Read full topic

@Fun_4_me_not_u wrote:

Check your brackets
